name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stepsy: create step-by-step guide with screenshots

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Struggle to describe your every step with screenshots in the browser manually? Welcome to Stepsy, your free AI-powered go-to solution for generating powerful, yet easy-to-understand step-by-step guides, SOPs, process tasks, or manuals, and sharing them with your colleagues and customers.

Our software features have been proven to deliver exceptional results. With our intuitive interface and robust functionality, you can streamline your processes and achieve greater efficiency.

Stepsy is free to use, along with Personal and Team plans to fit any team's needs.  


BENEFITS OF USING STEPSY:
📈 Increase data processing efficiency
📊 Improve workflow documentation accuracy
⚙️Ensure consistency across instructions
⏳ Save time of tedious work for each guide 
🎯 Simplify the training and onboarding process


STEPSY’S FEATURES:
📸Record your steps with screenshots on clicks: Just do your work, and we will automatically capture the screenshots with auto-generated descriptions.
✨Customize your screenshots: No need for other tools, we have a built-in image editor.
⚙️AI-tuned step descriptions and document summaries: Eliminate the need for manual repetitive text input, let us care about it.
📥Export and share via GDrive: Your guide quickly becomes shareable online via your own GDrive.
🔐Keep your screenshots safe: Your screenshots never leave YOUR space. Everything happens in YOUR browser and then gets exported directly to YOUR GDrive or YOUR local workstation. 


HOW TO USE STEPSY:
Step 1. Get started
Begin by downloading our extension for free. 

Step 2. Capture the process
Navigate to the website you want to document. Then, open the Stepsy icon in your Chrome toolbar and click the “Record a Guide” icon to initiate the process. Once you've captured your process, you can edit and customize it with a built-in toolset.

Step 3. Publish your results
Simply click the “Finish and share” button and publish it as a Google Docs document directly to your Google Drive.

What used to take hours, now takes seconds with our free step-by-step guide creator — empowering you and your team's productivity as well as allowing you all to focus on what truly matters: innovation and growth.
